content: {"name": "Salvation Army - Temple Corps", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients should have the gleeners card, if they dont have one they can sign up to get one", "email": "", "url": "https://www.salvationarmyusa.org/usn/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3729 West Chicago", "address_2": null, "city": "Nardin Park", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3727352, "longitude": -83.1209239}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 897-2914", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Gleaners Card Required. To apply for a card, please visit https://foodbankhelp.link2feed.com/"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
